line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Shops for items of two categories: needed and wanted.
* This should fail if the ship has no free docking ports.
* Merge needed and wanted list to make sure we buy as much as possible from this station

sval.val: DESCRIPTION: Shops for items of two categories: needed and wanted.
This should fail if the ship has no free docking ports.
Merge needed and wanted list to make sure we buy as much as possible from this station
